name: Show_Desk_Mount_Flex_Server
action:
<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(Desk_Mount_Flex_Server,Desk_Mount_Flex_Server_Message,FlexServer_NodeType,NodeSupplier_FlexServer,TrustedPlatform_ModuleTPM,Multi_WindowSupportFlex_Server,Displays_Flex Server in Desk0_2,TouchScreen_FlexServerDesk,Display_Size_FlexServer,IKBorOEP_FlexServer,Remote_Peripheral_Solution_Type_RPS,Display_Supplier,Trackball,ServerLocation_Cluster/Network_Group)*>
<*xDisallowallValuesExcept(ServerLocation_Cluster/Network_Group:<* LIST ( SELECT AttValue FROM ClusterAttValues WHERE CAST (AttValueCode AS float) <= '<*CTX( Container(List of Locations/Clusters/Network Groups).Rows.GetCount )*>' ) *>)*>
